messages.title: It's Time for Real Change
messages.content: This is a crucially important election that will decide the future of our country for decades to come. It is a once-in-a-generation chance to transform our country and take on the vested interests holding people back.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: A public vote on any Brexit deal with an option to remain as it is the best option for Oxford and Britain.
Increased funding for the NHS with more nurses and doctors to cut waiting lists and tackle the GP crisis and clean up our air.
A Green New Deal to tackle the climate crisis and create the needed green jobs.
A Real Living Wage of at least £10 an hour for all workers.
Stronger tenants' rights and real action on homelessness and rough sleeping.
Real funding increases for Oxford's cash strapped schools, reduced class sizes for 5-7 year-olds, and scrap tuition fees.

mentions.tacticalSituation: The ongoing Brexit chaos has divided our country and brought huge uncertainty for businesses and employers. Labour's Brexit proposals are aimed at fundamentally reshaping our country, turning us into a bargain basement tax haven on the fringes of Europe without lower food standards, workers' rights and environmental protections.

issues.brexitEurope: The ongoing Brexit chaos has divided our country and brought huge uncertainty for businesses and employers. Labour's Brexit proposals are aimed at fundamentally reshaping our country.

housing.content: Stronger tenants' rights and real action on homelessness and rough sleeping.
